jd: From: Laya, Incom Technologies laya@incom-tech.net Reply to: laya@incom-tech.net Duties/Responsibilities• Respond to computer system emergencies and resolve problems independently or in consultation with other IT staff or end-user personnel.• Research and resolve program, machine, data, or system software problems of a highly technical nature.• Provide expert advice and guidance on specialized application tools, hardware, software, or databases.• Provide specialized training to IT applications staff on databases, tools, techniques, and procedures relevant to applications maintenance and development.• Research new developments in hardware and software, staying abreast of the latest technologies.• Design, code, compile, test, debug, modify, and document new or existing highly complex applications programs.• Implement complex in-house and vendor-supplied applications software.• Evaluate, analyze, and prepare information and recommendations on technical solutions related to operating and managing an information system.Innosoft is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer• Independently define data elements and design structures for databases.• Prepare and monitor work plans and schedules to ensure timeliness, data integrity, and project availability.Required Experience• Proficiency in Java or C#/.NET for enterprise application development.• Expertise in SQL and working with relational databases such as Oracle (PL/SQL), PostgreSQL, or MySQL.• Experience with JavaScript or TypeScript for frontend or backend API development.• Familiarity with Oracle document repository systems and other ECM systems.• Strong knowledge of RESTful APIs for application integration.• Experience in deploying and managing applications in cloud environments such as AWS or Azure.• Proficiency in containerization and orchestration tools like Docker and Kubernetes.• Experience with version control using Git and CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).• Strong analytical skills and problem-solving abilities, especially in debugging complex systems.• Experience with developing, maintaining, and scaling highly complex applications in a production environment.
